title: Adobe Animate CC 2015.2 15.2.0.66 RePack [EN / MULTI] (by D!akov

Create interactive animations with sophisticated drawing tools, and publish their works on different platforms, including Flash / AIR, HTML5 Canvas, WebGL, and even custom platforms. Your content will be available on virtually any desktop and mobile devices.
